name: Your Average Criminal
description:
EDIT: UPDATED ICONS FOR STEALTHY ACTION TO BE THUMBS UP! SORRY

Made for the Trijam #97: The 3 hour game jam

Hosted by Trijam, rocknightstudios · #trijam

Here's "Your Average Criminal". Play as a thief and choose a path: Stealth or Aggression. Encounter a scenario and make the appropriate decision.

Aggressive actions will attract more heat to your wanted level. You'll hear the sirens closing in on you.

Can you outrun the cops and plan an escape or will you get busted and land a spot in jail?

Enjoy! ~BurterButterBeans Studio 2020
